rows.label: qst100901_msg0003
rows.name:
Do you have a Blade-san
who can melt ice?

rows.label: qst100901_msg0004
rows.name:
My Driver, Therida, has
been encased in ice!

rows.label: qst100901_msg0005
rows.name:
I can't do anything about it
with my own power, so I was
looking for someone to help.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0006
rows.name: I'm alive because Therida is alive...

rows.label: qst100901_msg0007
rows.name:
As I walked around, five
years passed since I left
the Kingdom of Luxuria...

rows.label: qst100901_msg0008
rows.name:
I heard there was a Blade
in Gula who uses amazing
fire, so I came here.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0009
rows.name:
But I couldn't find them...
and I can feel Therida's
power weakening...

rows.label: qst100901_msg0011
rows.name:
Are you the rumored Blade
who controls fire?!

rows.label: qst100901_msg0014
rows.name:
Therida is in the snowfields of
the Kingdom of Luxuria... near a
crevice, at Declessa Altar Hill.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I'd like
to guide you, but...

rows.label: qst100901_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm too far from Therida, so
I don't have much power.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0017
rows.name:
I'll definitely catch up!
Please, get to Therida quickly!

rows.label: qst100901_msg0101
rows.name:
Therida is in the snowfields of
the Kingdom of Luxuria... near a
crevice, at Declessa Altar Hill.

rows.label: qst100901_msg0102
rows.name:
I'll definitely catch up!
Please, get to Therida quickly!
